it.officinerobotiche.serial

Class Barrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.officinerobotiche.serial.Barrier

  • public class Barrier
extends java.lang.Object
    Object to create a blocking method. Used for block serial communication.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Barrier()

    • Method Detail

      • block

        public void block(long timeout)
           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocking method for a fixed time.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread before or while the current thread was waiting for a notification. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.

      • block

        public void block()
           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocking method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread before or while the current thread was waiting for a notification. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.

      • release

        public void release()
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Release method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread before or while the current thread was waiting for a notification. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.

      • releaseAll

        public void releaseAll()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Release all thread from a blocking method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread before or while the current thread was waiting for a notification. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.
